snippet.title: Trials Fusion & Trials Frontier  - Official E3 Trailer [UK]
snippet.description:
Go checkout our website : www.trialsgame.com 

Trials Frontier on mobile :

Trials Frontier is a unique social racing game, featuring a compelling storyline, friendly competition, accessible physics-based gameplay, and regularly updated content: Easy to play, Hard to master.
With Trials Frontier, you can take the Trials competition with you, wherever you go!


Trials Fusion on PS4, Xbox One, Xbox 360 and PC :

Trials Fusion melds the classic Trials formula of simple yet addictive competition with the social and visual breakthroughs of the next generation of gaming.
Introducing for the first time - tricks and a brand new futuristic environment!
Trials Fusion will also forge ahead with a cutting edge physics-driven trick system :

• Futuristic, high-tech world
• FMX Physics-Driven Trick System
• Next-gen visuals
• Next-gen social features
• And more!
